level1.title: Oracle Launches Agentic AI Platform for Banking
level1.snippet: Oracle introduced a new enterprise suite of AI-infused applications and pre-built agents at the Financial Services Summit, aiming to reshape retail banking with automated design tools and frameworks.

level1.title: AI Math Startup Valuation Quintuples
level1.snippet: A major backer of Anthropic has reportedly quintupled the valuation of an AI math startup in a new exclusive deal, signaling continued strong investor interest in specialized AI capabilities.

level1.title: BayesShield AI Blocks 92% of Losing Trades
level1.snippet: Perpetuals.com's BayesShield, powered by NVIDIA hardware, demonstrated a 92% success rate in blocking losing retail trades in a major backtest, showcasing AI's growing role in financial risk management.

market.news: Market Cap reaches $4.51T. Analysts monitoring China export risks.
Stifel raises price target to $346 ahead of Q4 earnings; focus on cloud growth and AI capex.

level2.title: India-US Trade Deal Boosts Tech Sector
level2.snippet: A new trade agreement is set to significantly boost semiconductors, data centers, and AI manufacturing in India, strengthening global tech supply chains.

level2.title: France Bans Public Officials from US Tech
level2.snippet: In a growing backlash against US technology dominance, France has moved to ban public officials from using American technology, seeking sovereignty and alternatives.

level2.title: Motorola Razr 70 Global Launch Imminent
level2.snippet: The new foldable phone has appeared in certification databases, suggesting a release is coming soon.
